ISSUE.TITLE: Record Sometimes gets duplicated
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v12.22.6** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **false** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.81.1** Sometimes when entering a record and linking it to another table the record get duplicated **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create two tables with a many to many link between them 2. Add an entry to the first table 3. Link it to a record in the second table 4. Save the record 5. see that another of of the record has appeared in the table **Expected behavior** No duplicate record should appear **Screenshots** The record `This Record will Disappear` gets duplicated, I was trying to replicate a different bug, hence the name. ![Bug 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/356086/142047339-a249585a-1c8f-4355-bbf0-fb8ed1e6453a.PNG) ![Bug 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/356086/142047346-f60fb6ed-c49e-43cd-8ebc-3f011cd127c6.PNG) ![Bug 3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/356086/142047333-07b98173-5652-4f9e-8cc2-58b1012836f5.PNG)
